interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: UNGLINGA Black Mask Blackhead Remover Purifying Peel Off Mask Bamboo Activated Charcoal Face Deep Pore Cleansing Mask For Face Nose and Acne Blemishes Treatment
Review Date: 2015/09/24
Store: UNGLINGA
Product Description: ['CONCERNS: Enlarged pore, Blackheads, Anti-aging, Fine lines and blemishes, Oily skin, Strawberry nose. Effect: Absorbent pores of blackheads and stubborn dirt, shrink pores, regulate oil secretion. How to use： Step 1 : Wash your face with warm water and cover it with a hot towel to open the pores . Step 2 : Spread the Blackhead remover mask gently on your face and wait 10-15 for it to dry. Step 3 : Peel off the black mask gently from chin to forehead . Step 4 : Rains with cold water and you may apply your daily skin care products afterwards. Tips: 1.The Blackhead Mask is only used for removing blackheads, exfoliating and cleaning the skin. 2.No effective against acne. Don’t use it on your acne or inflamed areas. 3.Spread the Blackhead Mask slowly in the same direction on your face and don’t stay on the same area too long. 4. Please ensure that you are not allergic. 5. If there is any discomfort, stop using. Package Included: 1 * Blackhead remover mask Gender: Unisex Net weight: 60g Shelf life: 3 years Ingredients: WATER, PROPANEDIOL, KAOLIN, POLYVINYLALCOHOL CROSSPOLYMER, POLYVINYL ALCOHOL, RUBBER LATEX, AMMONIUM GLYCOLATE, IMIDAZOLIDINYL UREA, AROMA']
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.9 x 3 x 2.9 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '712038120383 777269135650 646437061445 646437182287', 'Manufacturer': 'KoEily'}
Review Text: First  of all I am a huge fan of masks. I buy them all of the time. I have tried different  brands  from your dollar ones all the way to paying  $200 for one in a spa. So when  I  got  the  opportunity  to  review  this  product  for  free  in  exchange  for  an  honest  review  I was in. Let me say that  I liked the scent  which  is kind  of important  because  you  have  to  leave  this  mask on for at least 7 minutes. Next the color is dark  and the consistency  is lighter than what is typical. This means that a little  will go along way. It didn't  get too tight and was easy to remove. I used it both on my face and my cellulite  areas. It felt good  and I had no irritation. It definitely  made my face soft and bright. My makeup  also laid nicely. As far  as  the  cellulite  it didn't  melt  away. I am going  to continue  regulated use and see what  happens.
Review Title: Dead Sea Delight
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
OZNaturals Body Butter – This Natural Body Moisturizer Contains Sweet Almond & Macadamia Nut - This Luxurious Skin Moisturizer Will Provide Your Body With A Healthy Vibrant Glow!
MUPATER
['Size:30ML PuriDerma scar removal cream is highly effective in fading away scars from acne, cuts, stretch marks, C-sections, and surgeries.']
{'Brand': 'MUPATER', 'Scent': 'Almond', 'Item Form': 'Butter', 'Unit Count': '8.0 Ounce', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 1 inches; 8 Ounces', 'Manufacturer recommended age': '6 months - 3 years', 'Item model number': '04-KPOU-1KSA', 'UPC': '616806598506 885337394905', 'Manufacturer': 'OZ Naturals'}
My body butter arrived  a few days ago and I decided  to use it daily  on my entire  body. I love  the fact that  this  lotion  features  key ingredients  such  as Shea Butter, avocado  oil, and kukui nut oil. I applied  it every  night  before  bed. This butter  is super  rich  and  moisturizing. My legs were starting  to have  that  alligator  look and now they don't. I wish  this  scent was way stronger. It's to faint for me. Also this  butter absorbs  at a slower rate. That's why  I  choose  to apply  at night. I received  this  product  for  free  in  exchange  for  an  honest  review.
Super  rich!!
OZNaturals Tinted Moisturizer, SPF 30 Sunscreen. Broad Spectrum Protection. Zinc Oxide + Minerals In This Tinted Sunscreen Protects, Moisturizes And Blends Well To Provide A Rich, Youthful Glow!
OZ Naturals
['Skin care experts and dermatologists are in agreement on the importance of wearing sunscreen. \xa0Most premature aging of the skin is caused by sun exposure. “Photo aging,” as is it known in skin care circles, includes wrinkles, freckles, age spots, blotchy complexion, dullness, sagging skin and rough, leathery texture. \xa0In other words, just about every complaint surrounding aging skin can be traced at least in part to sun exposure, making daily sunscreen protection with an SPF 30 sunscreen a must. But not all sunscreens are created equal. \xa0OZNaturals Age Defying Solar Shield SPF 30 Broad Spectrum Tinted Sunscreen with Zinc Oxide provides broad spectrum protection from the sun’s harmful UVA/UVB rays, while moisturizing skin with a healthy-looking hint of color. Utilizing the highly stable and reflective properties of Zinc Oxide, with the natural UV diluting qualities of Octyl Methoxycinnamate, our formula offers sheer, broad-spectrum UV coverage in a luxurious tinted moisturizer formulation.']
{'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Sun Protection Factor': '30 Sun Protection Factor (SPF)', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.5 x 3.5 x 1 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'I1-7LV1-6RQ9', 'UPC': '638317780652', 'Manufacturer': 'OZ Naturals, LLC'}
First  of  all  let  me  tell  you that  this  product  is paraben, sulfate, mineral  oil, and lanolin  free. It can  be  applied  all  over  your  body  as well  as worn like  foundation  or under your  makeup. This sunscreen  has a brownish  tint to it and it blends  with  ease. I do wish  it was a little  darker. The consistency  is creamy  but not oily. I wish  the scent  was a bit stronger. I find  this  product  to  be  really  moisturizing. I received  this  product  for  free  in  exchange  for  an  honest  review.
A little  tint alotta  moisture!

profile:
**Updated User Summary:**

The user continues to demonstrate a strong preference for natural, moisturizing products rich in ingredients like Shea Butter, avocado oil, and nut oils to combat dry skin and enhance texture. They prioritize deep nourishment at night, maintaining a hydration-focused routine. Recent interactions suggest a growing interest in multifunctional products that provide hydration, sun protection, and a hint of color.

While they appreciate effective moisturizers, the user has expressed a desire for stronger scents, enhancing their sensory experience during application. Their high ratings indicate satisfaction with product performance, even when absorption rates are slower. The user has explored various masks, favoring those with appealing scents and effective results, such as softening and brightening effects on the skin. 

The user’s recent experience with a peel-off mask aligned with their values regarding scent and efficacy, highlighting their appreciation for products that deliver results without harsh ingredients. They seem to maintain an interest in effective cleansing and treatment options for concerns like enlarged pores and blackheads while meeting their sensory expectations.

Overall, the user values effectiveness, natural ingredients, and enhanced sensory experiences in their skincare regimen, along with an ongoing search for products that offer comprehensive hydration, sun protection, and sensory satisfaction.
